CustomField.formula: IF (AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "In Signatures"),(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "In Authoring"))),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"In Clause Approval"))), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__SendForTeamReview?id=" &Id , IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_SendToTeamReview", "Send For Teams Review"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Send For Teams Review
